sentences.cn: 一位相貌丑陋的老女巫走来.

sentences.en: For the old hag with the yellow teeth.
Look at that old hag showing off before the mirror.
sentences.cn: 你看,象个老妖精似的,在镜子前摇头晃脑的,呸!

sentences.en: Materials and Methods: Sixty - six patients with HCC underwent HAG and subsequent MRI in 10 days.
sentences.cn: 材料与方法: 研究对象:于MRI检查后10日内行肝血管造影检查的HCC患者66例.

sentences.en: Mother cut the cake in hag and gave us some each.
sentences.cn: 妈妈把蛋糕切成两半分给我们一人一半.

sentences.en: Old hag with the yellow teeth.
The language in which the hag addressed them was a strange and barbarous Latin.
sentences.cn: 那个母夜叉对他们说话时所用的语言是一种古怪而不规范的拉丁语.

sentences.en: Then, the wrinkled hag watching every portion you eat forces you to eat that vomit.
sentences.cn: 然后，这个看着你吃的有皱纹的丑陋的老太婆强迫你吃你吐的东西。

sentences.en: This intimation seemed to compose in some degree the vehement passion of the old hag.
sentences.cn: 这番交代似乎使老妖婆的无名怒火稍微平息了一点.

sentences.en: We complete other supplies - garment accessories, hag tag, lace, zipper, woven label, printed label, ironware accessories. etc.
sentences.cn: 同时公司配套供应其它服装辅料 、 吊牌 、 花边 、 拉链 、 织标印标 、 五金铸件等.

sentences.en: We give away 5,000 plastics hag at the exhibition.
sentences.cn: 在展览会上,我们赠送了五千只塑料袋.

sentences.en: Wild wood should be well protect from excessive hag.
sentences.cn: 野生森林应该被保护以免过量砍伐.

sentences.en: You are the third moon aspect as the Hag, Dark Moon, or the Crone.
sentences.cn: 您以冥月, 或沧桑的老妇展现月的第三种形态.

sentences.en: You must be insane, you ugly old hag!
sentences.cn: 你一定是疯了, 你这又老又丑的老巫婆.

sentences.en: You want to teach when you're an old hag?
sentences.cn: 当你是个丑老太婆的时候还要去教书?

trans.tran_en: an ugly or unpleasant woman, especially one who is old or looks like a witch
